detailType.description: The level of detail to include in the notifications for this resource. Possible values are `BASIC` and `FULL`.

eventTypeIds.description:
A list of event types associated with this notification rule.
For list of allowed events see [here](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/codestar-notifications/latest/userguide/concepts.html#concepts-api).

resource.description: The ARN of the resource to associate with the notification rule.

status.description: The status of the notification rule. Possible values are `ENABLED` and `DISABLED`, default is `ENABLED`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

targets.description: Configuration blocks containing notification target information. Can be specified multiple times. At least one target must be specified on creation.
